name: Checkout Overview - initial state validated & cancel checkout
fullName: features/checkout.feature:Checkout Overview - initial state validated & cancel checkout
statusMessage:
AssertionError: User did not land on 'Checkout: Information' page
assert 'checkout-step-one.html' in 'https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html'
 +  where 'https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html' = get_current_url()
 +    where get_current_url = <ui_automation_suite.bdd_tests.page_objects.checkout_page.CheckoutPage object at 0x7fb6ffd7e390>.get_current_url

testStage.statusMessage:
AssertionError: User did not land on 'Checkout: Information' page
assert 'checkout-step-one.html' in 'https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html'
 +  where 'https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html' = get_current_url()
 +    where get_current_url = <ui_automation_suite.bdd_tests.page_objects.checkout_page.CheckoutPage object at 0x7fb6ffd7e390>.get_current_url

steps.name: Given the login page is displayed
When user tries to login with standard_user
Then user is redirected to the products page
When user adds product Onesie to the cart
And user navigates to the shopping cart
Then the cart icon displays 1 product(s)
When user proceeds to checkout
Then user lands on checkout Information
When user fills in First Name
And user fills in Last Name
And user fills in Postal Code
And user clicks on Continue
Then user lands on checkout Overview
And the checkout contains 1 product(s)
And product Onesie is displayed in the Checkout
And the quantity of product Onesie is 1 in the Checkout
And the price of product Onesie is $7.99 in the Checkout
And the full name of product Onesie displayed is Sauce Labs Onesie in the Checkout
When user clicks on Cancel
Then user lands on checkout Information
steps.statusMessage:
User did not land on 'Checkout: Information' page
assert 'checkout-step-one.html' in 'https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html'
 +  where 'https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html' = get_current_url()
 +    where get_current_url = <ui_automation_suite.bdd_tests.page_objects.checkout_page.CheckoutPage object at 0x7fb6ffd7e390>.get_current_url
steps.statusTrace:
AssertionError: User did not land on 'Checkout: Information' page
assert 'checkout-step-one.html' in 'https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html'
 +  where 'https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html' = get_current_url()
 +    where get_current_url = <ui_automation_suite.bdd_tests.page_objects.checkout_page.CheckoutPage object at 0x7fb6ffd7e390>.get_current_url
